programmes.show_description: Get creative with the beauty of paper florals. Featuring new Flowers at Home MEGA kit, floral wall art, and coordinating apertures - thoughtfully designed for mindful iris folding.
Join Sharon for inspiration with the Tim Holtz Distress range - a popular, comprehensive line of crafting products designed to create aged, vintage, and weathered effects.
Tune in for the latest arrivals from Craftreat! Discover fresh supplies for stenciling, scrapbooking, and art journaling, and find everything you need to inspire your next project.
The talented Carla Bagshaw returns to HobbyMaker with a fresh take on quilling! Don't miss her unique flair as she brings this classic technique to life in a whole new way.
Join Sharon for inspiration with the Tim Holtz Distress range - a popular, comprehensive line of crafting products designed to create aged, vintage, and weathered effects.
HobbyMaker Repeats.
HobbyMaker Repeats.
...Finished Store: For the first time ever, Quilter Lynne Goldsworthy is selling her finished quilts! Limited to one of each.
...Fabric Collection: Launching this striking collection by Kaffe Fassett!
...Anniversary Kit: Bring a touch of regency elegance into your home with this exquisite quilt. Inspired by the timeless charm of Jane Austen.
...Patch Quilt: Celebrate classic quilt design with this beautifully pieced hexagon-flower quilt by Allison Maryon.
Lynne Goldsworthy has designed this beautiful Kaffe Fassett x William Morris Quilt, perfect for all who love these two famous fabric designers!
Join Allison for a fun, creative hour of seasonal sewing - featuring a table runner, bunny bags, fabric-tied baskets, Easter charms, and a cheerful Spring Into Summer cushion.
Join Craig for the latest Pocket Pads & Frames launch. Easily create truly cute card designs for all sorts of occasions with these super handy Pocket Pads.
Join us for the Elegant Embossing Show featuring Tim Holtz Embossing Folders, Stacey's Diffuser Embossing, the Beautiful Botanicals Embossing Bundle, and more.
Cute enough to brighten anyone's day, the NEW Vertical Edge Stamp & Dies collection brings fun and endless creativity to your papercraft creations.
Join AALL & Create and tune in for fabulous demos and amazing deals - a crafty hour awaits with new stamps, dies, stencils, washi tape and more.
Hunkydory's much loved Little Books have become an essential for crafters! Each Little Book comes with atleast 144 pages of imagery on a high quality 150gsm paper.
Tune in for Takeover Reloaded Deals, bringing you a selection of top offers and exclusive savings, giving you the chance to get more value on crafty products before time runs out!

HobbyMaker Repeats.
Join Adam Brooks for an extra hour of Sewing Street as the Birthday celebrations continue!
Sarah Patterson is bringing beautiful brand new fabrics in all compositions!
Janet Clare will be bringing us the brand new Edith Quilt, High Tea Quilt, FQ bundles and have some amazing deals on instructions.
Sarah Patterson is bringing beautiful brand new fabrics in all compositions!
David Green is back on Sewing Street, with an hour and a half of the fantastic Green Machine!
Tune in to discover this multi-award-winning, family-run craft company! Explore their latest collection of stunning stamps, papers, embellishments, and creative stamp sets.
Christine is back with another fantastic show featuring brand-new products - bringing you fresh ideas and must-have supplies to elevate your next crafting project.
Tune in for an exciting collection of co-ordinating papers from Tim holtz featuring the Palette Collection - rich, aged, and bursting with character.
